description.header: The (Unofficial) Telegram Support Group of Hong Kong
description.text: Founded in Fall 2016, the team dedicated to provide aids for Hong Kong Telegram users, to solve enquiries like how to use Telegram and localisation issues.

404.description: "Stars may fade, as darkness fills the air..."<1/>Let us home. Together we stand. :)
404.copyright_note: Background picture by Hong Kong Apple Daily, taken August 23, 2019 at the Lion Rock, Hong Kong.
